name: ANCIENT SOCCER
description:
The game contains many modes and challenges, in which you control teams of players with different abilities. At the start of each challenge, huge balls fall from above. Score them into the goal as fast as you can!

Your players kick the balls, attract the balls, shoot at the balls, explode the bombs near the balls and much more. There are a total of 18 player abilities in the game. Each challenge has a unique combination of them. Make smart decisions and act really fast to get the most out of your team!

After successful games, your global rating is updated. For example, you can be in the top 57% or the top 9% of all players around the world.

Comfort: the locomotion system is comfortable for everyone.
VR clubs: ideal for VR clubs and VR competition organizers.
